organization.$: Nanjing University of Information Science and Technology

head.citation-title: Splicing Detection for Color Images Based on QDCT Markov method
head.abstracts: © 2017, Editorial Office of Journal of Applied Sciences. All right reserved.We propose a splicing detection scheme based on quaternion discrete cosine transform (QDCT). The scheme uses correlation among three channels of a color image to reduce loss of the image's inherent color information. QDCT is first applied to the images, and features are extracted with the proposed scheme in the QDCT domain. SVM is used to detect image splicing. Using the image bases CASIA1 and CASIA2, accuracy of the proposed scheme reaches 98.75% and 96.78% respectively, which is better than most of existing methods.
